channel.title: Pages on Sushant
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Sushant

item.title: About
item.author: map[username:sushantdhiman host:outlook.com] (Sushant)
item.description: Hello there, I am Sushant, currently living in Chandigarh Full stack developer working on Node.JS / React / Sequelize / GraphQL mainly. In past I have used Ember.js / Angular.js / Yii / Laravel to develop many web apps. Member of Sequelize core team. I also contribute to node-mysql2, unexpected.js and other OSS whenever I find some spare time. This is my blog which I use to record things I am currently working on or learning.

item.title: Projects
item.author: map[username:sushantdhiman host:outlook.com] (Sushant)
item.description: List of some open source projects I contribute to Sequelize ORM, Most popular ORM for Node.js Sequelize CLI, The Sequelize CLI unexpected-date, A plugin for unexpected.js for date/time assertions mysql2, Performant MySQL adapter for Node.js with prepared statements unexpected.js, Beautiful Node.js test assertions graphql-sequelize Solid Sequelize + GraphQL support tools
